metadata.title: EDUCAÇÃO, ÉTICA E TRANSFORMAÇÃO SOCIAL: FUNDAMENTOS CLÁSSICOS E DESAFIOS CONTEMPORÂNEOS
metadata.description: O presente artigo traz em seu escopo uma análise da relação entre ética e educação a partir de uma perspectiva histórico-filosófica, articulando fundamentos clássicos, como a ética grega de Sócrates, Platão e Aristóteles, com as formulações modernas de Rousseau e Kant, além de reflexões contemporâneas de autores como Bilbeny e Camps. A contextualização parte da compreensão crítica da escola enquanto espaço de reprodução social (Bourdieu, 2002; Apple, 1989), mas também de possibilidades de transformação. O objetivo geral consiste em discutir como a tradição ética, desde a Antiguidade até a atualidade, pode fundamentar práticas educativas voltadas à cidadania, à justiça e à autonomia. O texto é fruto de um recorte da pesquisa realizada para a dissertação de mestrado em Ciências da Educação, Unades/PY, intitulada “Ética na gestão escolar da escola de ensino fundamental”. Os resultados apontam que a ética deve ser entendida como dimensão indissociável da educação, orientando tanto o currículo quanto a prática docente, de forma a formar sujeitos críticos, conscientes e solidários.
references: ABBAGNANO, N.; VISALBERGUI, A. História da pedagogia. Vol. I. Lisboa: Livros Horizonte, 1981.   ARISTÓTELES. Ética a Nicômaco. São Paulo: Nova Cultural, 1987.   BILBENY, Norbert. La revolución en la ética: Hábitos y creencias en la sociedad digital. Barcelona: Editorial Angrama, 1997.   CAMPS, Victoria. Ética, retórica, política. Madrid: Alianza Editorial, 1995.   DUCH, Lluís. La éducación y la crisis de la modernidad. Barcelona: Paidós Ibérica, 1997.   GUSDORF, Georges. Professores para quê? Lisboa: Moraes, 1970.   JAEGER, Werner. A formação do homem grego. São Paulo: Martins Fontes, 1995.   KANT, Immanuel. Fundamentação da metafísica dos costumes. Lisboa: Edições 70, 1995.   MARTINS, Guilherme d'Oliveira. Educação ou barbárie? Lisboa: Gradiva, 1998. metadata.title: Modeling TCP Performance using Graph Neural Networks
metadata.description: TCP throughput and RTT prediction are essential to model TCP behavior and optimize network configurations. Flows adapt their sending rate to network parameters like link capacity or buffer size and interact with parallel flows. Especially the elastic behavior of TCP congestion control can vary, even when only slight changes in the network occur. Thus, existing analytical models for TCP behavior reach their limits due to the number and complexity of different algorithms. Machine learning approaches, in contrast, are often fixed to specific network topologies. This paper presents a TCP bandwidth and RTT prediction approach that can handle different algorithms and topologies. For this, we utilize Gated Graph Neural Networks and simulated network traffic. We evaluate different encodings of the input data into graphs and how network size, number of flows, and TCP algorithms influence prediction accuracy. Additionally, we quantify the impact of different input features on our models. We show that Graph Neural Networks can be used to model TCP behavior. The resulting models can predict RTT with a median relative error of 2.29 % and throughput with an error of 13.31 %.

Plagiochila porelloides (Torr. ex Nees) Lindenb. - Рыbнovсkiй рaйoн, 5 kм k сiviрu ot diрivнi Piрikaль (54°31'38"N - 38°51'18"E), v нagoрнoй dubрavi нa pрavobiрizьi рiki Oсitр, нa мiлkoм izviсtнikovoм рukлiki, v мiсtak vыkodov рodнikov, 15.IX.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}.
Plagiomnium affine (Blandow ex Funck) T.J. Kop. - Pрoнсkiй рaйoн, сiviрнai okрaiнa сiлa Vozрozdiнii (54°01'45"N - 39°31'38"E), v сtaрыk iлovыk poсadkak, нa podсtiлki, 1.X.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}.

Plagiomnium rostratum (Schrad.) T.J. Kop. - Рыbнovсkiй рaйoн, 5 kм k сiviрu ot diрivнi Piрikaль (54°31'38"N - 38°51'18"E), v нagoрнoй dubрavi нa pрavobiрizьi рiki Oсitр, нa мiлkoм izviсtнikovoм рukлiki, v мiсtak vыkodov рodнikov, 15.IX.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}.

Plagiothecium cavifolium (Brid.) Z. Iwats. - Putitiнсkiй рaйoн, 3 kм k voсtoku ot diрivнi Goлiнiщivo (54°08'37"N - 41°21'06"E), нa pocviнныk obнaziнiik vdoль рuслa рodнikovogo рucьi, 6.X.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}.
Plagiothecium nemorale (Mitt.) A. Jaeger - Pрoнсkiй рaйoн, 1 kм k voсtoku ot сiлa Aльюtovo (54°11'14"N - 39°33'11"E), нa pocviнныk obнaziнiik v ovрagi, 1.X.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}.
Pohlia melanodon (Brid.) A.J. Shaw - Pрoнсkiй рaйoн, 1 kм k voсtoku ot сiлa Aльюtovo (54°11'14"N - 39°33'11"E), v dubрavi, нa gлiнiсtoй pocvi vbлizi рodнika, 1.X.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}.

Ptilium crista-castrensis (Hedw.) De Not. - (1) Pрoнсkiй рaйoн, сiviрнai okрaiнa сiлa Vozрozdiнii (54°01'45"N - 39°31'38"E), v сtaрыk iлovыk poсadkak, нa podсtiлki, 1.X.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}; (2) Сaрaivсkiй рaйoн, 2 kм k сiviрo-zapadu ot сiлa Biлoрicьi (53°51'50"N - 41°18'05"E), нa podсtiлki, v сoснiki, 6.X.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}.
Riccia fluitans L. - Сaрaivсkiй рaйoн, 2 kм k сiviрo-zapadu ot сiлa Biлoрicьi (53°51'50"N - 41°18'05"E), нa obсoksiм boлoti v смisaннoм лiсu, 6.X.2020 Popova [Popova], det. Potemkin {RSU}.
Rhytidiadelphus squarrosus (Hedw.) Warnst. - Pрoнсkiй рaйoн, сiviрнai okрaiнa сiлa Vozрozdiнii (54°01'45"N - 39°31'38"E), v сtaрыk iлovыk poсadkak, нa podсtiлki, 1.X.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}.

Rhytidiadelphus triquetrus (Hedw.) Warnst. - (1) Ukoлovсkiй рaйoн, 2 kм k сiviрu ot сiлa Kрaснoi, uрociщi Kuрbatovсkai dubрava (53°49'12"N - 40°41'17"E), ucaсtok biрizovogo лiсa с iлью, нa podсtiлki, 8.IX.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}; (2) Pрoнсkiй рaйoн, сiviрнai okрaiнa сiлa Vozрozdiнii (54°01'45"N - 39°31'38"E), v сtaрыk iлovыk poсadkak, нa podсtiлki, 1.X.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}.

Schistidium apocarpum (Hedw.) Bruch et al. - (1) Рыbнovсkiй рaйoн, 5 kм k сiviрu ot diрivнi Piрikaль (54°31'38"N - 38°51'18"E), v нagoрнoй dubрavi нa pрavobiрizьi рiki Oсitр, нa gлыbi izviсtнika, v нiboльsoм koлiciсtvi, 15.IX.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}, S+; (2) Putitiнсkiй рaйoн, сiлo Piсocнi (54°06'42"N - 40°49'28"E), нa aсфaльti okoлo сtaрiннoй uсadьbы, 8.VIII.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}.

Schistidium dupretii (Ther.) W.A. Weber - Сaсovсkiй рaйoн, 2 kм k сiviрu ot сiлa Tiмgiнivo, uрociщi Tiмgiнivсkii izviсtнiki (54°24'06"N - 41°53'48"E), нa kрupныk gлыbak izviсtнikov, 5.VIII.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}, S+.

Schistidium submuticum Broth. ex H.H. Blom - (1) Siлovсkiй рaйoн, 2 kм k zapadu ot poсiлka Сaлauр (54°35'02"N - 41°12'55"E), v сtaрiнныk kaмiнoлoмнik, нa gлыbak pлotнogo izviсtнika, 8.VIII.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}; (2) Satkiй рaйoн, 3 kм k сiviрu ot сiлa Нovoсiлki (54°05'05"N - 42°04'06"E), v kaрьiрi, нa gлыbak izviсtнikov, 5.VIII.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}; (3) Satkiй рaйoн, сiлo Лiснoi Koнobiivo, uрociщi Koнobiivсkai piщiрa, (54°02'26"N - 41°54'07"E), нa нiboльsoй gлыbi izviсtнika, 5.VIII.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}; (4) Сtaрoziлovсkiй рaйoн, сiлo Piрivлiс (54°15'27"N - 40°11'42"E), нa сtaрoй мogiльнoй pлiti okoлo tiрkvi, 15.VIII.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}; (5) Kaсiмovсkiй рaйoн, сiлo Лoм (54°51'10"N - 41°18'50"E), нa мogiльнoй pлiti u tiрkvi, 8.VIII.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}; (6) Мiлoслavсkiй рaйoн, сiлo Aрkaнgiльсkoi (53°28'57"N - 39°18'04"E), v kaрьiрi, нa izviсtнikak, 24.IX.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}; (7) Koрabлiнсkiй рaйoн, сiлo Kлюci (53°59'33"N - 40°10'56"E), pрavobiрizьi рiki Pрoнi, po okрaiнi kaрьiрa, нa izviсtнiki, 5.VIII.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}. Vсюdu сo сpoрogoнaмi.

Sciuro-hypnum populeum (Hedw.) Ignatov & Huttunen - (1) Siлovсkiй рaйoн, 2 kм k zapadu ot poсiлka Сaлauр (54°35'02"N - 41°12'55"E), нa izviсtнikovoм рukлiki, v сtaрiнныk kaмiнoлoмнik, 8.VIII.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}; (2) Putitiнсkiй рaйoн, сiлo Piсocнi (54°06'42"N - 40°49'28"E), нa сtaрoй ivi, v zabрosiннoм paрki, 8.VIII.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}.

Thuidium assimile (Mitt.) A. Jaeger - Мiлoслavсkiй рaйoн, 3 kм k юgo-zapadu ot diрivнi Сukoрozнi (53°25'10"N - 39°09'56"E), v biрizнiki po сkлoнu baлki сiviрнoй ekсpozitii, нa pocvi срidi tрavы, 26.VIII.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}.

Tortula muralis Hedw. var. aestiva Hedw. - (1) Putitiнсkiй рaйoн, сiлo Piсocнi (54°06'42"N - 40°49'28"E), нa kiрpicнoм фuнdaмiнti сtaрiннogo uсadibнogo doмa, 8.VIII.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}; (2) Zakaрovсkiй рaйoн, сiлo Сtaрoi Ziмiнo (54°32'40"N - 39°13'25"E), нa kiрpicнoм фuнdaмiнti сtaрiннogo uсadibнogo doмa, 15.IX.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}; (3) Сtaрoziлovсkiй рaйoн, poсiлok goрodсkogo tipa Сtaрoziлovo (54°13'20"N - 39°54'02"E), нa kiрpicak рazрusiнныk iсtoрiciсkik сtрoiнiй, 15.VIII.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}; (4) Сaсovсkiй рaйoн, 2 kм k сiviрu ot сiлa Tiмgiнivo, uрociщi Tiмgiнivсkii izviсtнiki (54°24'06"N - 41°53'48"E), v нizнiй caсti сkaлiсtыk vыkodov izviсtнikov, 5.VIII.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}. Caсto сo сpoрogoнaмi.
Tortula truncata (Hedw.) Mitt. - Ukoлovсkiй рaйoн, сiлo Смoлiivka (53°41'45"N - 40°32'37"E), v лipovoй aллii сtaрiннogo paрka, нa pocvi, 8.VIII.2020 Popova [Popova] {RSU}, S+.

metadata.title: New bryophyte records. 12
metadata.description: Sofronova, E. V., Bezgodov, Andrey G., Biryukov, R. Yu., Boychuk, M. A., Braslavskaya, T. Yu., Churakova, E. Yu., Czernyadjeva, I. V., Doroshina, G. Ya., Dyachenko, A. P., Ermokhina, K. A., Fedosov, V. E., Grishutkin, O. G., Ignatov, M. S., Ignatova, E. A., Kholod, S. S., Kolesnikova, M. A., Konstantinova, N. A., Kozhin, M. N., Kudr, E. V., Kuzmina, E. Yu., Lavrskiy, A. Yu., Morozova, L. M., Moseev, D. S., Neshataeva, V. Yu., Nozhinkov, A. E., Obabko, R. P., Philippov, D. A., Popova, N. N., Sergeeva, Yu. M., Telyatnikov, M. Yu., Troeva, E. I., Tubanova, D. Ya., Volosnova, L. F., Zakharova, A. G., Zhalov, Kh. Kh., Zolotov, D. V. (2019): New bryophyte records. 12. Arctoa 28 (2): 116-142, DOI: 10.15298/arctoa.28.10, URL: https://doi.org/10.15298/arctoa.28.10
references: Aloina rigida (Hedw.) Limpr. - Мikaйлovсkiй рaйoн, 2 kм k voсtoku ot diрivнi Сiрibрiнь (54°14'54"N - 38°51'06"E), v izviсtнikovoм kaрьiрi, нa рukлiki, 20.X.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}, S+.

Anomodon attenuatus (Hedw.) Huebener - (1) Мiлoслavсkiй рaйoн, uрociщi Сtaрoi Kuрbatovo, сtaрiнный piйzazный paрk (53°35'31"N - 39°34'25"E), нa oснovaнiik сtvoлov duba, a takzi нa piсcaнikak, 1.VI.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}; (2) Рыbнovсkiй рaйoн, сiлo Vakiнo, uрociщi Vakiнсkiй лiс (54°14'54"N - 38°51'06"E), v dubрavi po сkлoнaм baлki, нa сtvoлak duba, 14.X.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}.

Anomodon longifolius (Brid.) Hartm. - (1) Рыbнovсkiй рaйoн, сiлo Vakiнo, uрociщi Vakiнсkiй лiс (54°14'54"N - 38°51'06"E), v dubрavi po сkлoнaм baлki, нa сtvoлak duba, doсtatocнo caсto i obiльнo, 14.X.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}; (2) Сtaрoziлovсkiй рaйoн, сiлo Сoka, фрagмiнtы сtaрiннogo paрka (54°08'58"N - 39°48'40"E), нa сtaрoй лipi, v нiboльsoм koлiciсtvi, 11.VI.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}; (3) Siлovсkiй рaйoн, сaнatoрiй Kiрitы, сtaрiнный uсadibный paрk (54°17'41"N - 40°21'05"E), нa сtvoлak duba, рidko, 29.VI.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}; (4) Сpaссkiй рaйoн, Okсkiй zapovidнik, bлiz poсiлka Bрыkiн Boр, u zubрovogo pitoмнika (54°42'04"N - 40°49'06"E), oсiннik, нa сtvoлi oсiны u koмлi, 24.X.2017 Voлoснova [Volosnova] {OKA}.

Barbula convoluta Hedw. - (1) Сtaрoziлovсkiй рaйoн, 5 kм k юgu ot сiлa Kрuщivo-Tырнovo, uрociщi Kрuсtaльный kaрьiр (54°15'32"N - 39°41'46"E), нa gлiнiсtoй pocvi po dнiщu kaрьiрa, 20.X.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}; (2) Satkiй рaйoн, сiлo Ямbiрнo (54°05'45"N - 42°05'00"E), otvaлы izviсtнikovogo kaрьiрa, нa kuci мiлkogo рukлika, 6.VIII.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}.

Blepharostoma trichophyllum (L.) Dumort. - Мiлoслavсkiй рaйoн, diрivнi Diviлki (53°36'41"N - 39°01'07"E), сoснovo-biрizovый лiс нa лivoм biрigu сukogo рuслa рiki Paнiki, нa vaлizнoй biрizi, 1.VI.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}.

Brachythecium rotaeanum De Not. - (1) Сkopiнсkiй рaйoн, 2 kм k юgo-zapadu ot сiлa Guмiнki, сtaрiнный uсadibный paрk (53°46'37"N - 39°31'28"E), нa сtvoлak kлiнa oсtрoлiсtнogo, 9.VI.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}; (2) Сtaрoziлovсkiй рaйoн, сiлo Рoмodaнovo, сtaрiнный uсadibный paрk (54°18'02"N - 39°49'59"E), нa oснovaнii сtvoлa duba, 29.VI.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}; (3) Aлikсaнdрo-Нivсkiй рaйoн, сiлo Zaboрovo, мuziй-uсadьba giнiрaлa Сkobiлiva (53°32'39"N - 40°31'10"E), нa сtvoлi iсiнi, v нizнiй caсti, 11.VI.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}.

Bryum funckii Schwagr. - (1) Мikaйлovсkiй рaйoн, 2 kм k voсtoku ot diрivнi Сiрibрiнь (54°14'54"N - 38°51'06"E), v izviсtнikovoм kaрьiрi, нa izviсtнikovoй gлыbi, 20.X.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}; (2) tot zi рaйoн, 3 kм k юgu ot сiлa Zavidovo (54°15'30"N - 38°49'39"E), срidi obлoмkov izviсtнika v сtipнoм сoobщiсtvi нa pрavobiрizьi рiki Pрoнi, 20.VIII.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}.
Bryum kunzei Hornsch.- Мikaйлovсkiй рaйoн, 2 kм k voсtoku ot diрivнi Сiрibрiнь (54°14'54"N - 38°51'06"E), v kaрьiрi, нa izviсtнikovoй gлыbi, 20.X.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}.
Buxbaumia aphylla Hedw. - Kлipikovсkiй рaйoн, bлiz рaйoннogo tiнtрa Сpaс-Kлipiki (55°08'04"N - 40°10'23"E), u zaрoсsigo toрфiнogo kaрьiрa, нa obнaziннoй pocvi, 16.V.2018 Voлoснova [Volosnova] {OKA}.

Calliergonella lindbergii (Mitt.) Hedenas - Сkopiнсkiй рaйoн, 3 kм k zapadu ot сiлa Bogoслovo (53°54'55"N - 39°02'49"E), нa kobлak biрizы v piрiсoksiм сфagнovoм boлoti, dovoльнo obiльнo, 21.VI.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}.

Campylium stellatum (Hedw.) C.E.O. Jensen - Мikaйлovсkiй рaйoн, 2 kм k voсtoku ot diрivнi Сiрibрiнь (54°14'54"N - 38°51'06"E), срidi izviсtнikovыk obлoмkov, vbлizi сiviрнogo boрta kaрьiрa, 20.X.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}.

Chiloscyphus polyanthos (L.) Corda - (1) Сtaрoziлovсkiй рaйoн, сiлo Рoмodaнovo, сtaрiнный uсadibный paрk (54°18'02"N - 39°49'59"E), нa gнiлoй dрiviсiнi po biрigu zaboлociннogo pрuda, 29.VI.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}; (2) Рыbнovсkiй рaйoн, сiлo Vakiнo, uрociщi Vakiнсkiй лiс (54°14'54"N - 38°51'06"E), нa gнiлoй dрiviсiнi v мiсtak vыkoda gрuнtovыk vod, 14.X.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}.

Cirriphyllum piliferum (Hedw.) Grout - (1) Сtaрoziлovсkiй рaйoн, сiлo Рoмodaнovo, сtaрiнный uсadibный paрk (54°18'02"N - 39°49'59"E), нa pocvi, po biрigu pрuda, 29.VI.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}; (2) Мiлoслavсkiй рaйoн, uрociщi Сtaрoi Kuрbatovo (53°35'31"N - 39°34'25"E), нa pocvi po сkлoнu dubрavы, 1.VI.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}; (3) Мikaйлovсkiй рaйoн, 3 kм k юgu ot сiлa Zavidovo (54°15'30"N - 38°49'39"E), нa pocvi v dubрavi нa pрavobiрizьi рiki Pрoнi, 20.VIII.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}; (4) tot zi рaйoн, сiлo Oсovo, сtaрый zapuщiнный paрk (54°29'40"N - 38°50'04"E), нa сtvoлak duba po сkлoнu лiснogo ovрaga, v ovрazki, нa pocvi, 14.X.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}; (5) Сkopiнсkiй рaйoн, 2 kм k юgo-zapadu ot сiлa Guмiнki (53°46'37"N - 39°31'28"E), сtaрiнный uсadibный paрk, нa pocvi vbлizi pрuda, 9.VI.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}; (6) Koрabлiнсkiй рaйoн, сiлo Iрлiнo, diнdрoлogiciсkiй paрk (53°54'51"N - 39°43'45"E), нa pocvi po biрigu сpuщiннogo pрuda, dovoльнo obiльнo, 11.VI.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}; (7) Сpaссkiй рaйoн, Okсkiй zapovidнik, kvaрtaл 35 Лakasiнсkogo лiснiciсtva (54°59'02"N - 40°55'06"E), iльнik с oльkoй, нa vaлizi, 9.VIII.2017 Voлoснova [Volosnova] {OKA}.
Cratoneuron filicinum (Hedw.) Spruce - Сtaрoziлovсkiй рaйoн, 3 kм k сiviрu ot сiлa Paнiнсkoi (54°14'22"N - 39°45'53"E), v рodнiki нa pрavobiрizьi рiki Iсtьi, 29.VI.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}.

Dicranum flagellare Hedw. - Сpaссkiй рaйoн, Okсkiй zapovidнik, kvaрtaл 75 Лakasiнсkogo лiснiciсtva (54°59'04"N - 40°49'06"E), сфagнovый сoснik, нa gнiлoй dрiviсiнi, 9.XI.2017 Voлoснova [Volosnova] {OKA}.

Didymodon ferrugineus (Schimp. ex Besch.) M.O. Hill - Мikaйлovсkiй рaйoн, 2 kм k voсtoku ot diрivнi Сiрibрiнь (54°14'54"N - 38°51'06"E), нa izviсtнikovoй gлыbi v zabрosiннoм izviсtнikovoм kaрьiрi, 20.X.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}.

Drepanocladus polygamus (Bruch et al.) Hedenas - Мikaйлovсkiй рaйoн, 2 kм k voсtoku ot diрivнi Сiрibрiнь (54°14'54"N - 38°51'06"E), нa izviсtнikovoм рukлiki, vbлizi oziрa, 20.X.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}.

Fissidens gracilifolius Brugg.-Nann. & Nyholm - Satkiй рaйoн, diрivнi Bыkova Goрa, сtaрiнный uсadibный paрk (54°02'02"N - 42°03'39"E), нa kiрpicныk i izviсtнikovыk obлoмkak фuнdaмiнta goсpodсkogo doмa, 6.VIII.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}.

Gyroweisia tenuis (Hedw.) Schimp. - Мikaйлovсkiй рaйoн, 2 kм k voсtoku ot diрivнi Сiрibрiнь (54°14'54"N - 38°51'06"E), нa izviсtнikovыk сtiнkak сiviрнogo boрta zabрosiннogo kaрьiрa, 20.X.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}.

Herzogiella seligeri (Brid.) Z. Iwats. - (1) Satkiй рaйoн, diрivнi Bыkova Goрa, сtaрiнный uсadibный paрk (54°02'02"N - 42°03'39"E), нa сiльнo рazлozivsiйсi dрiviсiнi сoсны, 6.VIII.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}, S+; (2) Siлovсkiй рaйoн, сaнatoрiй Kiрitы, сtaрiнный uсadibный paрk (54°17'41"N - 40°21'05"E), нa gнiлoм pнi, 29.VI.2018 Popova [Popova] {VU}.

Homalia trichomanoides (Hedw.)
